data.name: PayPal_Email_Help
data.value: User’s email address associated with the PayPal account that will receive payments.

data.name: ListingDurationOptions_Help
data.value:
Start Date & Duration – Schedule a start date and time and select the number of days (duration) the listing will be active.

Start Date & End Date – Specify both a starting and ending date and time.

Duration Only – Listing becomes active right away and ends after the number of days selected.

End Date Only – Listing becomes active immediately and ends at the specified end date and time.

data.name: ShowShippingInfoOnItemLists
data.value: Show Shipping Info On Item Lists

data.name: ShowShippingInfoOnItemLists_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The least expensive shipping option will be shown below the title in "Browse" and "Search" listing result lists

data.name: ShowSellerLocationOnListingDetails
data.value: Show Seller Location on Detail Page

data.name: EnableGTC_Help
data.value: Gives the listing agent the option to have their listing remain open until sold out or manually canceled.

data.name: ShowSellerOnListingRow
data.value: Show Seller Name in Search Results

data.name: ProcessingEnabled_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: The following background processes are enabled:

  • Starting Listings - Activates listings set to begin in the future
  • Listing Resolution - Ends and resolves listings
  • Fee Refresher - Calculates fees owed
  • Notifier - Manages sending emails

If this option is not enabled, the above processes do not run. The results are: listings never start or end, no system emails, and no fee invoicing.

data.name: EnableNotifications_Help
data.value:
When Email Notifications Enabled is checked, the system processes and sends email notifications to buyers and sellers indicating activity with their listings, etc.

If this is unchecked, emails are not queued and are not sent.

data.name: RequireAuthentication_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Users must be registered and signed in to view any listing details.

data.name: DisplayListingType
data.value: Display Listing Type in Search Results

data.name: AllowSellerEditDuration
data.value: Allow Changes To Listing End Date / Duration

data.name: AllowSellerEditDuration_Help
data.value: Note: For Auctions, this only applies to listings with no bids.

data.name: BatchPaymentDate_Help
data.value:
If a month does not have the selected day then the system will choose the last day of that month.
(Example: Day 30 is selected and the month is February)

Consequently, choosing "31" will always run on "the last day of the month."

data.name: BatchPaymentPeriod_Help
data.value: Set to "Never" to disable scheduled payments. Otherwise, choose how often scheduled payments should be attempted.

data.name: AllowSellerEditStartDate
data.value: Allow Edit of Start Date for Scheduled Listings

data.name: AllowSellerEditStartDate_Help
data.value: This only applies to listings which have not yet started (Scheduled Listings).

data.name: DisableBuyNowAfterWinningBids
data.value: Disable Buy Now After Winning Bids

data.name: DisableBuyNowAfterWinningBids_Help
data.value: If checked (disabled), the Buy Now option will disappear as soon as the first winning bid is placed. Checked or unchecked, the Buy Now option will remain available if the Reserve Price is not met.

data.name: EnableProxyBidding_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Bids are automatically entered on behalf of the bidder for the lowest amount required to win the item.

Otherwise, the proxy system will not be used and the maximum bid will always be placed immediately.

data.name: ProxyBiddingBelowReserve_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Proxy bidding will function the same regardless of whether the Reserve Price has been met or not, which will result in the auction ending unsuccessfully if there is only one bidder (even if their maximum proxy bid is greater than the Reserve Price). Otherwise (if disabled), the proxy system will automatically increase the bid level to meet the Reserve Price if possible.

data.name: DefaultSalesInvoiceComment_Help
data.value: This text will be automatically inserted into the Comments field of your new sales invoices.

data.name: FeedbackEnabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The transaction feedback and rating system is available to users.

data.name: SecureURL_Help
data.value:
Example: https://www.xyz.com

If you do not have an SSL certificate installed for your website, the secure URL should match the above URL.

data.name: URL_Help
data.value:
Example: http://www.xyz.com

The full URL, including http://, for use in generating the internal software links and links within the email templates.

data.name: UserMessagingEnabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Users are allowed to message other users. If allowing classified ads, this setting should be enabled to allow users to contact the ad owner.

data.name: AcceptAMEX_Help
data.value: If Enabled: "American Express" will be made available as a card type option for credit card payments.

data.name: AcceptDiscover_Help
data.value: If Enabled: "Discover" will be made available as a card type option for credit card payments.

data.name: AcceptMastercard_Help
data.value: If Enabled: "Mastercard" will be made available as a card type option for credit card payments.

data.name: AcceptVisa_Help
data.value: If Enabled: "Visa" will be made available as a card type option for credit card payments.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The software will connect to your Authorize.net account and "Checkout with Credit Card" will be available as a checkout option. This payment method allows users to submit credit card payments without leaving the website. Note: This payment method also requires "Stored Credit Cards" to be enabled.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_MerchantLoginID_Help
data.value: Your Authorize.Net API login for use with site fee invoices.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_PaymentDescription_Help
data.value: Used to describe the transaction between the Administrator and the Merchant.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_PostUrl_Help
data.value: Specifies the URL used by the Authorize.Net payment provider to post payment transactions. Generally, this value should not be changed except for testing or troubleshooting purposes.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_TestMode_Help
data.value:
When checked, payments will be posted as test transactions. No money will actually be transferred.

Test credit card numbers (expiration date must be set to the present date or later):

  • American Express Test Card: 370000000000002
  • Discover Test Card: 6011000000000012
  • Visa Test Card: 4007000000027
  • Second Visa Test Card: 4012888818888

data.name: AuthorizeNet_TransactionKey_Help
data.value: Your Authorize.Net transaction key for use with site fee invoices.

data.name: BottomBannersToDisplay_Help
data.value: The number of randomly selected banners to display at the bottom of certain pages.

data.name: ChargeFeesWhenRelisting_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Associated listing fees will be charged to the seller when an item is re-listed.

data.name: CreditCardsEnabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: All associated credit card data forms will appear to the users. Credit card data can be saved on your website for future purchases.

data.name: DisplayListingType_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The listing type will be displayed on the Listing Results page for both Browse and Search.

data.name: DurationDaysList_Help
data.value: Enter the number of 'day' options to be presented to sellers for their listings.

data.name: EnableMultipleCultures_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The software will allow multiple languages features that you elect to support.

data.name: EnableMultipleCurrencies_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The software will allow currencies and conversions that you elect to support.

data.name: EnableShipping_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers may specify flat shipping cost details when creating or editing listings.

data.name: HideTaxFields_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Tax functionality will be removed site wide - including the "My Account" area, "Create Listing" area and on Invoices.

data.name: LeftBannersToDisplay_Help
data.value: The number of randomly selected banners to display on the left side of certain pages.

data.name: MaxAutoRelists_Help
data.value: The maximum number of times an item will automatically re-list if it does not sell.

data.name: MaxHomePageFeatured_Help
data.value: The maximum number of items that appear at one time on the homepage.

data.name: MaxImagesPerItem_Help
data.value: The maximum number of images a seller can upload for each listing.

data.name: MaxResultsPerPage_Help
data.value: The maximum number of individual listings that will appear on each page.

data.name: MetaDescription_Help
data.value: This is used by search engines when displaying search results containing a link to your site.

data.name: MetaKeywords_Help
data.value: These are used by search engines for ranking your site.

data.name: PayPal_CancelReturnURL_Help
data.value: The URL to which PayPal will redirect the user if payment fails or is canceled by the user.

data.name: PayPal_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: PayPal's "Website Payments Standard" service is available as a checkout option. This payment method redirects users to paypal's website to complete the payment and then redirects back to your website afterwards.

data.name: PayPal_FeesEmail_Help
data.value: The email address associated with the PayPal account that will be receiving site fee payments.

data.name: PayPal_IPNURL_Help
data.value: The URL to which PayPal will report the outcome of payment attempts. This value should generally not be changed, except for testing, troubleshooting or advanced customizations.

data.name: PayPal_PostURL_Help
data.value: The URL used by the PayPal payment provider to post payment transactions. This value should generally not be changed, except for testing, troubleshooting or advanced customizations.

data.name: PayPal_ReturnToMerchantText_Help
data.value: Specifies the link text shown on PayPal pages for the link back to the auction website (The Cancel Return URL).

data.name: PayPal_SuccessReturnURL_Help
data.value: The URL to which PayPal will redirect the user upon successful submission of a payment. This value should generally not be changed, except for testing, troubleshooting or advanced customizations.

data.name: RequireAddressOnRegistration_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The user will be required to enter their address information during the registration process.

data.name: RequireCreditCardOnRegistration_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The user will be required to enter their credit card information during the registration process.

data.name: RestrictOutsideSellers_Help
data.value: If Enabled: New users will only be granted Buyer privileges when they register, rather than Buyer and Seller privileges.

data.name: ShowBidHistoryUserNames_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Usernames are displayed in listing purchase history or bid history reports.

data.name: ShowCategoryCounts_Help
data.value: If Enabled: A count of how many active listings exist under each category (including all subcategories) is displayed in parenthesis next to the category name on pages that contain the category navigation.

data.name: ShowCurrencyCodes_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The currency code is displayed next to all prices throughout the site.

data.name: ShowCurrencySymbol_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The currency symbol is displayed next to all prices throughout the site.

data.name: ShowPendingListings_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Listings that are scheduled to begin in the future will be displayed on the home page, browse pages and in search results.

data.name: ShowSellerLocationOnListingDetails_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The seller's City, State/Region and Country from their "Primary Address" will be displayed on the detail page

data.name: ShowSellerOnListingRow_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The seller's username is displayed below the listing title and subtitle when displayed in search result lists.

data.name: ShowZeroCountCategories_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Category navigation will include all categories in the tier, even if they contain zero active listings. Otherwise (if disabled), only categories with at least one active listing existing under them will be displayed in the category navigation.

data.name: SiteTitle_Help
data.value: Used as the standard prefix for all page titles (the title displayed in the title bar of most web browsers).

data.name: SniperProtectionSeconds_Help
data.value: If a bid is placed within the set number of seconds before the item ends, the auction will be automatically extended this number of seconds.

data.name: SystemEmailAddress_Help
data.value: Email address that automated system emails originate from.

data.name: SystemEmailName_Help
data.value: Name that appears in the 'From' field for emails sent by the system.

data.name: ThumbnailType_Help
data.value:
Cropped: The image will be cropped to a square to fit the image display area.

Scaled to Fit: The image will be scaled down until the width fits the image display area.

data.name: TopBannersToDisplay_Help
data.value: The number of randomly selected banners to display at the top of all pages.

data.name: UsejQueryTimePicker_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The jQuery Time Picker will be available on the Create Listing page 2 of 2.

data.name: UserApprovalRequired_Help
data.value: If Enabled: All new user registrations will require manual approval before the user will be able to use the website services.

data.name: VerifyUserEmail_Help
data.value: If Enabled: New users will not be able to sign in until they verify their email address. Verification requires entering a randomly generated verification code which is delivered via email.

data.name: BuyersPremiumPercent_Help
data.value: This amount will be automatically added to your new sales invoices.

data.name: EnableWebAPI_Help
data.value: The Web API allows specified users to access certain site functionality through an API to perform actions outside of the AuctionWorx website, through a web service. When checked, enables the Web API. When unchecked, completely disables the Web API.

data.name: ShowLanguageRegionOptions_Help
data.value: If Enabled: With "Enable Multiple Cultures" also set, the footer language dropdown will show regional language options (e.g. "English (United States)" in addition to basic language options (e.g. "English")

data.name: test_bool1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_date1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_decimal1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_enum1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_enum2_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_int1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: test_string1_Help
data.value: some help text -- pretty helpful, eh!?

data.name: EnableBuyersPremium_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Sellers can choose to add a percentage premium to the final cost of a listing.

Note: This feature can be used independently from the Buyer Final Fee, which adds a line item to the buyer’s Site Fee Invoice for each sale.

data.name: ListingOption_Bold_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to select the "Bold" listing option

data.name: ListingOption_Featured_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to select the "Featured" listing option

data.name: ListingOption_Highlight_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to select the "Highlight" listing option

data.name: ListingOption_Sunburst_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to select the "Sale Badge" listing option

data.name: ShowHomepageDecorations_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Listings displayed on the homepage will include any listing options selected by the seller.

data.name: CssTheme_Help
data.value: A few themes have been included for your convenience to be used as-is or as a starting point for your own custom Bootstrap CSS theme design.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteFeeInvoices_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Fee invoices older than the specified number of days will automatically be removed from the system.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteFeeInvoices_IncludeUnpaid_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Unpaid fee invoices will also be removed automatically.
If Disabled: Only paid fee invoices will be removed automatically.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteListings_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Listings older than the specified number of days will automatically be removed from the system.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteListings_IncludeSuccessful_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Listings that ended successfully will also be removed.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteSaleInvoices_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sale invoices older than the specified number of days will automatically be removed from the system.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteSaleInvoices_IncludeUnpaid_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Unpaid sale invoices will also be removed automatically.
If Disabled: Only paid sale invoices will be removed automatically.

data.name: DataCleanup_Enabled_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Listings and/or invoices older than the specified number of days will automatically be removed from the system periodically.
Note: Disabling this option will also disable all other options on this page.

data.name: RestrictCustomFieldEdits_Help
data.value: If Enabled: when bids are placed this will disallow the custom fields from being changed

data.name: EnableRecaptchaForContactUs_Help
data.value: If Enabled, requires the user to pass a Captcha test before submitting the Contact Us page.

data.name: EnableRecaptchaForRegistration_Help
data.value: If Enabled, required the user to pass a Captcha test before submitting the Registration page.

data.name: RecaptchaPrivateKey_Help
data.value: The Recaptcha Private Key assigned to you by Google.

data.name: RecaptchaPublicKey_Help
data.value: The Recaptcha Public Key assigned to you by Google.

data.name: SiteTimeZone_Help
data.value:
The Time Zone to display all date/times in.
Note: All names and abbreviations can be changed in TimeZones.resx

data.name: TimeZoneLabel_Help
data.value: Optional text label that will be displayed after all date/time values throughout the site

data.name: MaintenanceMode_Help
data.value: If Enabled: the home page will show the contents of the Under Construction Mode CMS and a "login" link. Additionally, only admins will be allowed to login.

data.name: PaginateHomepageEvents_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Up to "Max Home Page Items" events will be shown on the homepage, with page links for the rest.
If Disabled: All eligible events will be shown on the homepage in one list.

data.name: DefaultBrowseSort_Help
data.value: Select which sort option is selected by default when browsing listings

data.name: EnableRegions_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Browse and search results can be filtered by Region and all listings will provide an optional "Region" selection in addition to a listing category when created.

data.name: ShowTimeZoneLabel_Help
data.value: If Enabled: All date/time values will be displayed with the time zone abbreviation (e.g. Eastern Time (US & Canada) would show "ET" after all times)

data.name: DefaultLotNumberDigits_Help
data.value:
If a seller does not enter a lot number, one will be automatically assigned. The number assigned will be formatted with the number of characters entered in this setting.

Example:
When the default lot number digits is set to "1", the lots will be assigned a lot number starting with "1".
 
When the default number format is set to "3" the lots will be assigned a lot number starting with "001"

data.name: EnableEventDescription_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Description" field will be available when creating or editing an event

data.name: EnableEventManagedBy_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Managed By" field will be available when creating or editing an event

data.name: EnableEventShippingInfo_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Shipping Info" field will be available when creating or editing an event

data.name: EnableEventSummary_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Summary" field will be available when creating or editing an event

data.name: EnableEventTermsAndConditions_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Terms & Conditions" field will be available when creating or editing an event

data.name: Theme_Classic_Dark_02
data.value: Classic - Dark (Subtle Graphic Birch Tree Background)

data.name: Theme_Classic_Light_02
data.value: Classic - Light (Subtle Graphic Birch Tree Background)

data.name: PayPal_BackupPaymentCurrency_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Invoices in a currency not accepted by PayPal will be converted to the selected currency before the payment request is sent to PayPal.

If Disabled: Invoices in a currency not accepted by PayPal will not show PayPal as a payment method.

data.name: HomepageCategories_Help
data.value: Categores and Regions will appear on the homepage to the left of the homepage featured listings.

data.name: HomepageRowDisplayNumber_Help
data.value: The number of homepage featured listings to display horizontally for all devices with a viewing area larger than 1200px. The more listings across, the smaller each image will be.

data.name: AuthorizeNet_EnableForSellers_Help
data.value:
When checked, sellers will be allowed to enter their own Authorize.Net credentials for accepting sales payments.

If un-checked, only Admin users will be able to accept credit cards for sales payments of their own listings.

data.name: SalesTaxEnabled_Help
data.value: Sales tax will be optionally charged based on buyer's location and tax rates specified by each seller

data.name: VatAppliesToBuyersPremium_Help
data.value: VAT on sale invoices will include buyer's premiums

data.name: VatAppliesToShipping_Help
data.value: VAT on sale invoices will include shipping costs

data.name: VatAppliesToSiteFees
data.value: VAT applies to Site Fee Invoices

data.name: VatAppliesToSiteFees_Help
data.value: apply VAT to site fee invoices

data.name: VATEnabled_Help
data.value: VAT tax will be charged on all sale invoices and site fee invoices as configured by admin preferences

data.name: VatRate_Help
data.value: This percentage tax will be added to invoices as configured below

data.name: TimeRemainingStyle_Help
data.value: This setting determines the formatting of the remaining time when shown on the homepage, browse/search pages and listing/lot detail pages

data.name: EnableBuyNow_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to specify a Buy Now Price for Auction listings

data.name: EnablePDFAttachments_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to attach one or more PDF documents to their listings

data.name: EnableReserve_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to specify a Reserve Price for Auction listings

data.name: EnableYoueTubeVideos_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Sellers will be able to attach a youtube video to their listings

data.name: EnablePublicQandA_Help
data.value: If Enabled: authenticated users can post questions publicly on any Active or Preview listing

data.name: EnableWatchCount_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Listing/Lot detail page will display a count of the number of users currently watching

data.name: GalleryType_Help
data.value: Select from smaller thumbnail images or full size images. Full size image display best displayed in 3 or 4 across with Homepage Categories disabled.

data.name: StripeConnect_ClientId_Help
data.value:
This value can be found under the "Your Account > Connect > Settings > Platform Settings" section on stripe.com after you register your website as a platform.

Note: Enter a Redirect URI as “http(s)://(your website)/Stripe/HandleStripeConnectResponse”

data.name: StripeConnect_EnabledForSellers_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Sellers will be allowed to connect their Stripe account for accepting sales payments.

Note: If you enable this option you must also add a Connect endpoint on your stripe account. Go to "Your Account > API > Webhooks > Endpoints receiving events from your account > Add endpoint", enter the URL as "http(s)://(your website)/Stripe/WebHookHandler" and choose Live events.

data.name: StripeConnect_Enabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The software will connect to your Stripe account using the Connect API and "Checkout with Credit Card" will be available as a checkout option. This payment method allows users to submit credit card payments without leaving the website. Note: this payment method allows credit cards to be saved remotely on stripe.com for use with future purchases.

data.name: StripeConnect_SiteFeesPublishableApiKey_Help
data.value: This value can be found under the "Your Account > API" section on stripe.com.

data.name: StripeConnect_SiteFeesSecretApiKey_Help
data.value: This value can be found under the "Your Account > API" section on stripe.com.

data.name: AcceptCreditCard_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The "Checkout with Credit Card" option will be available at checkout. This option requires Authorize.Net credentials.

data.name: AcceptPayPal_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The "Checkout with PayPal" option will be available at checkout. This option requires a PayPal email address.

data.name: AllowInstantCheckout_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Buyers will be able to checkout immediately after purchase.
If Disabled: You will be able to make adjustments to all invoices (e.g. updating shipping, tax, buyer's premium) before the buyer can complete checkout.

data.name: PaymentInstructions_Help
data.value: This information will be displayed to all users when viewing the details of your listings. This information will also appear on unpaid invoices if no other payment options are available.

data.name: TaxExempt_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Taxes will be excluded from all invoices where this user is the payer

data.name: DefaultBrowseStyle_grid
data.value: Grid, a gallery format with larger images

data.name: DefaultBrowseStyle_Help
data.value: This setting determines the default style to display results on the browse/search pages

data.name: DefaultBrowseStyle_list
data.value: List, one listing per row with more text

data.name: HomepageContent_Help
data.value: This setting controls what content is displayed on the home page

data.name: EnableNonAuctionListingsForEvents_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: Sellers will be allowed to create Fixed Price and/or Classified listings separate from Auction Lots/Events
NOTE: You must also enable either or both of these listing types before they can be used.

data.name: CenterLogo_Help
data.value: Default logo position for PC and Tablets is left aligned. Enable this setting to center the logo on the page. For all devices where the viewing area is less than 768px wide (i.e. mobile devices) the logo will be centered automatically.

data.name: EnableMakeOffer_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Buyers may submit offers with alternate price, quantity and terms to the seller

data.name: AllowMultipleOffers_Help
data.value: If Enabled: buyers may submit more than one offer on the same list/lot before the first offer has been accepted, declined or countered by the seller.

data.name: OfferNotificationsEnabled_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: buyers and sellers will receive email notifications when offers are sent, received, accepted, declined or countered.
Note: each individual notification type can be enabled or disabled from the CMS > Email Templates area.

data.name: OfferTimeLimitHours_Help
data.value: When buyer's make an offer to a seller, the offer expires in this number of hours, or when the lot/listing ends, whichever comes first.

data.name: HeadingColor_help
data.value: Select and set the color that will be applied to the site heading. Use the color picking utility or enter the 6 character HEX code. All HEX codes must be preceded by a HASH '#' symbol.

data.name: SellerUsernameDetailPage
data.value: Show Seller Information On Detail Page

data.name: SellerUsernameDetailPage_Help
data.value: Show or Hide the seller information on the listing/lot detail page. This includes the username, location, and feedback star rating.

data.name: RequireAdminToPublishEvent_Help
data.value: If Enabled: non-Admin sellers will not be able to publish event immediately. Instead, when the “Publish Event” option is clicked by a non admin an email notification is sent to the address configured in the “Site Preferences > Contact --Administrator Email” field with links to publish or view the event. The admin can also publish the event at any time by impersonating the seller and clicking the “Publish Event” dropdown option.

data.name: FollowAuctionLiveEnabled_Help
data.value:
As an auction event begins closing, users will have the option to "Follow Auction Live" which automatically redirects them to the next Lot closing in the current event as each lot ends.

* If enabled, every event will have its own setting to enable or disable the ability for users to “Follow Auction Live”.

Note: When enabled for an event, the system will automatically add all lots to the same auto-extend group so that each lot will close one at a time and in the proper lot order.

data.name: SalesTaxAppliesToBuyersPremium
data.value: Sales Tax applies to Buyer's Premium

data.name: SalesTaxAppliesToBuyersPremium_Help
data.value: Sales Tax on sale invoices will include buyer's premiums

data.name: MaxEventsPerPage_Help
data.value: The maximum number of events that appear on each page.

data.name: QuickBidEnabled_Help
data.value:
If Enabled: a "Quick Bid" button will be available on the item detail page, and will attempt to submit the current minimum bid amount if clicked.
Note: This setting does not affect the "Enable Inline Bidding (Quick Bid)" setting.

data.name: EventHomeCategories_Help
data.value: Categories and Regions will appear on the event detail page to the left of the lots.

data.name: LargeBidConfirmationEnabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: If a user attempts to place a bid for 100 times higher (or more) than the minimum acceptable bid amount then an extra popup modal will be displayed to confirm if they meant, e.g. "$100.00" or "$10,000.00", in case the bidder mistakenly forgot a decimal point.

data.name: RollingLotUpdatesEnabled_Help
data.value: Lots will automatically disappear from the auction event detail page as they close. New lots will automatically appear at the bottom of the list to replace them.

data.name: Consignor_Help
data.value: (Optional) Use this field to specify the name or ID of the consignor for this lot, if applicable. Sales transactions can be exported with this data for post auction CSV export.

data.name: QuickBidForListViewsEnabled_Help
data.value: If Enabled: a "Quick Bid" button will be available for each auction item, and will attempt to submit the current minimum bid amount if clicked. This includes: Browse/Search results, Watch List, and My Bidding list.

data.name: QuickBidForListViewsEnabled_EventsHelp
data.value: If Enabled: a "Quick Bid" button will be available on each auction item, and will attempt to submit the current minimum bid amount if clicked. This includes: Browse/Search results, Event Detail page (Auction Sale Catalog), Watch List, Bidding List.

data.name: DataCleanup_DeleteArchivedEvents_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Archived Auction Events older than the specified number of days will automatically be removed from the system.

data.name: AutoChargeCCs_Help_EN
data.value:
Off: Credit cards will NOT be automatically charged.
Immediately: The card on file will automatically be charged when the invoice is automatically created.
Daily: Once per day the card on file will be charged for each unpaid sales invoice, at the specified time.

data.name: AutoChargeCCs_Help_EV
data.value:
Off: Credit cards will NOT be automatically charged.
When Event Closes: The card on file will automatically be charged when the associated event closes.
Daily: Once per day the card on file will be charged for each unpaid sales invoice, at the specified time.

data.name: AutoGenerateInvoices_Help
data.value: If Enabled: The sale will immediately be added to a new or existing invoice when a purchase, an accepted offer or a winning bid is finalized. When enabled, the Allow Instant Checkout setting that individual sellers set from their My Account > Listing Preferences > Payment page will be disabled as an option; as soon as an invoice is automatically generated, a buyer can checkout with any payment service the seller account has configured.

data.name: RequireCreditCardForBuyers_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Buyers will be required to have an unexpired credit card on file before placing bids, making purchases or submitting offers.

data.name: RequireCreditCardForSellers_Help
data.value: If Enabled: Seller will be required to have an unexpired credit card on file before creating new listings or lots.

data.name: MaxSellerFinalFee_Help
data.value: If the calculated fee is more than this value, use this value instead.

data.name: MinSellerFinalFee_Help
data.value: If the calculated fee is less than this value, use this value instead.

data.name: CreditCardRequiredExempt_Help
data.value: When enabled for user, they will be able to place bids or create listings/lots/events without entering in a CC, even if “Require Credit Card for Buyers and/or Sellers” is turned on.

data.name: NewletterOptInByDefault_Help
data.value: If Enabled: the "Newsletter" checkbox will be checked by default on the user registration form

data.name: HideBannersOnMobile_Help
data.value: Top, side, and bottom banners (if configured) will be hidden on devices with a viewing area smaller than 768px wide.
